metaTitle: Villa Elysia Jávea - €1,285,000 | 4 Bed Luxury Villa
metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom villa in prestigious Monte Olimpo, Jávea. Contemporary design, 1000m² plot, private pool. €1,285,000. Contact us today for exclusive viewing.

content.metaTitle: Villa Elysia Jávea - €1,285,000 | 4 Bed Luxury Villa
content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom villa in prestigious Monte Olimpo, Jávea. Contemporary design, 1000m² plot, private pool. €1,285,000. Contact us today for exclusive viewing.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Elysia, an architectural masterpiece nestled in the exclusive Monte Olimpo district of Jávea. This stunning contemporary villa represents the pinnacle of Mediterranean luxury living, where Ibiza-inspired design meets Costa Blanca sophistication. Set on a generous 1,000m² private plot, this exceptional 4-bedroom residence offers an unparalleled blend of modern comfort and timeless elegance.

Developed by the prestigious Miralbo Urbana, Villa Elysia showcases meticulous attention to detail throughout its 162m² of thoughtfully designed living space. From the moment you enter, you'll be captivated by the seamless flow between indoor and outdoor living areas, floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the interiors with natural light, and carefully curated outdoor spaces that invite year-round enjoyment of the Mediterranean climate.

locationSection.intro:
Villa Elysia occupies a prime position in Monte Olimpo, one of Jávea's most coveted residential areas within the Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar district. This prestigious location offers the perfect balance of tranquil privacy and convenient access to Jávea's renowned beaches, vibrant town center, and exceptional amenities. The elevated position provides stunning views while maintaining easy connectivity to the coastal lifestyle that defines this remarkable corner of the Costa Blanca.

The surrounding area is characterized by upscale villas, manicured landscapes, and a sense of exclusivity that attracts discerning international buyers. Monte Olimpo's reputation as a premier residential destination is well-established, with its proximity to championship golf courses, marinas, and some of Spain's most beautiful beaches making it highly sought-after by those seeking the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle.
highlights: Walking distance to pristine Arenal Beach and Granadella Beach
5 minutes to Jávea's charming historic town center and port
Close proximity to La Sella Golf Resort and Jávea Golf Club
Easy access to premium restaurants, boutiques, and international schools
Strategic location between Valencia (90km) and Alicante airports (100km)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Elysia exemplifies contemporary luxury through its thoughtful design and premium specifications. Every element has been carefully selected to create a harmonious living environment that maximizes comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal while celebrating the natural beauty of its Mediterranean setting.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and premium finishes
3 elegantly appointed bathrooms with high-end fixtures
Open-plan living and dining areas with floor-to-ceiling windows
Modern fully-equipped kitchen with premium appliances
Private swimming pool with surrounding terraces
Covered parking for two vehicles with direct access
Landscaped Mediterranean gardens with native vegetation
High-quality materials including natural stone and wood accents

content.investmentSection:
Villa Elysia represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most desirable coastal markets. Jávea's property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and consistent growth, driven by increasing international demand for luxury coastal properties. The combination of limited land availability in prime locations like Monte Olimpo and growing interest from European buyers seeking permanent or vacation homes creates strong fundamentals for capital appreciation.

The Costa Blanca's year-round appeal, excellent climate, and established infrastructure make it a premier destination for luxury property investment. Properties of Villa Elysia's caliber in prestigious locations consistently outperform the broader market, offering both lifestyle benefits and strong rental potential for investors seeking income generation. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax environment for international residents, this represents an ideal opportunity to secure a premium asset in Europe's most sought-after coastal region.
whyBuySection: Prime location in exclusive Monte Olimpo with prestigious address
Contemporary Ibiza-inspired architecture by renowned Miralbo Urbana
Generous 1,000m² private plot ensuring privacy and exclusivity
Turn-key luxury villa with premium finishes and modern amenities
Strong investment potential in proven Costa Blanca luxury market
Year-round Mediterranean climate and outdoor lifestyle
Proximity to world-class beaches, golf, and international amenities

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there any additional costs?
faqs.answer: Villa Elysia is priced at €1,285,000. Additional costs include Spanish property transfer tax (6-10%), legal fees, notary fees, and registration costs. We provide detailed cost breakdowns and can connect you with mortgage specialists through our Habeno partnership.

faqs.question: What makes the Monte Olimpo location special?
faqs.answer: Monte Olimpo is one of Jávea's most prestigious residential areas, offering privacy, exclusivity, and stunning views. It's walking distance to beautiful beaches, close to the town center, and surrounded by upscale properties, making it highly desirable for luxury living and investment.

faqs.question: How does the Spanish property buying process work?
faqs.answer: The process involves making an offer, signing a private purchase contract with deposit (typically 10%), conducting due diligence, securing financing if needed, and completing at the notary. We guide international buyers through each step and coordinate with legal professionals.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno, specialist mortgage brokers for international buyers in Spain. They can arrange financing up to 70% for non-residents with competitive rates. Contact us for a personalized mortgage consultation and pre-approval.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for Villa Elysia?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea's premium locations generate excellent rental returns, particularly during high season (April-October). The combination of location, amenities, and quality makes this property highly attractive for vacation rentals and long-term lets.

faqs.question: When will Villa Elysia be completed?
faqs.answer: As a new development by Miralbo Urbana, Villa Elysia is being built to the highest standards with modern construction methods. Completion timeline and handover dates are available upon request. All properties meet current Spanish building regulations and energy efficiency standards.

faqs.question: What is included in the sale?
faqs.answer: Villa Elysia includes the fully finished property, fitted kitchen with appliances, built-in wardrobes, air conditioning, private pool, landscaped gardens, covered parking for two cars, and all fixtures and fittings as specified by the developer.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We arrange private viewings for serious buyers. Contact us via WhatsApp at our dedicated link or call +34 634 044 970 to schedule your exclusive viewing. We can also arrange virtual tours for international clients unable to visit immediately.

content.conclusion: Villa Elysia represents a rare opportunity to acquire a prestigious luxury residence in one of Jávea's most coveted locations. With its contemporary design, premium specifications, and prime Monte Olimpo address, this exceptional property offers both an enviable Mediterranean lifestyle and strong investment fundamentals. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Costa Blanca luxury - contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and begin your Spanish property journey.
